overview: Is it that my photographs cage me in nostalgia?  Every one of them  They let me be selfish  And the more I zoom, the less I understand,  is it that my photographs cage me in nostalgia?  Only them in unison  Home I need, I do not want to return,  I do not deserve to return, I will not return.  How much is hidden within my photographs?  Is it that my photographs cage me in nostalgia?
title: Bagatelle 3: Lo que ocultan
